summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4764 for the improvement of 35th Avenue North from the southline of Coulter's Addition to East Thomas Street, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55109 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
